title: Why does irelia do so much damage? (w/ screenshots)
body:
The screenshot's show that Irelia has only a triforce as a damage item but does the most damage to champions in the game? Even with my full glass build as Viktor that can oneshot squishies, why should she still do so much damage?
#BetterNerfIrelia

replies.body: If the player (who play irelia) played an adc (top) she would have more dmg due to harass and kills but yeah @RLG Shaky

> [{quoted}](name=Best Viktor AU,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=NLWVoRyv,comment-id=,timestamp=2015-05-11T07:42:39.948+0000)
has only a triforce as a damage item

http://apollo-uploads-oce.s3.amazonaws.com/1431813919/6ef27763d628902abc139d718274b383c36528c7c901669099d66e73fed9ecd0.jpg

 most damage to champions in the game
 most damage to champions in the game
 most damage to champions in the game
 most damage to champions in the game
 most damage to champions in the game
Possibly because your viktor build is trash.

28 kill participation, 32k damage

Seems fine to me, she was against a maokai, so honestly this is to be expected (he probably had flask/pots start, he has his passive etc.)

> [{quoted}](name=JasonWazza,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=NLWVoRyv,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2015-05-11T09:07:29.182+0000)
>
> 28 kill participation, 32k damage
> 
> Seems fine to me, she was against a maokai, so honestly this is to be expected (he probably had flask/pots start, he has his passive etc.)

Pretty sure rumble jungle isnt nearly as common as Maokai jungle, still plausable
my bad i assumed mao, even then it just changes to going through a shield.

> [{quoted}](name=JasonWazza,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=NLWVoRyv,comment-id=000300000000,timestamp=2015-05-11T09:17:54.063+0000)
>
> my bad i assumed mao, even then it just changes to going through a shield.

:P

High base damages, synergises with Trinity Force and she's melee. You are comparing a ranged champions damage with a melee champions damage; one of them can use abilities safety and the other has to put themselves in harm's way.

Also, Viktor is AoE where Irelia is mostly single target, if you were bursting one person at a time over using AoE to chunk multiple people then the base damages on your abilities (which are lower than a single target ability) will make you deal less total damage.

if you look at her score she contributed to a lot of kills and also got a lot of kills, she has a lot of poke and can burst people down with just a tri force, tri force is amazing on her due to the fact that she has a ult that can trigger the passive 4 times dn then her q as well on top of that, and when he has visage her health regen and life steal is amazing making her w stronger, also sh wis overpowered and very strong :D
Maybe she had alot of kill participation oh wait SHE DID
